Ltd.]])[http://investing.businessweek.com/research/stocks/private/snapshot.asp?privcapId=35113453]
Avtar Panesar(Vice President of International Operations)
Navraj Panesar([[CEO]])[http://www.creativematch.com/directory/yashraj-films-international-ltd/]| industry = [[Entertainment]]| products = | revenue = | operating_income = | homepage = [http://www.yashrajfilms.com www.yashrajfilms.com] }} '''Yash Raj Films International Ltd.''' is the [[International]] [[subsidiary]] of [[India]]'s largest [[Film]] [[production company]].It distributes Yash Raj Films in the [[UK]] and also the whole of [[Europe]].[http://www.yashrajfilms.com/ContactUs/ContactUsLanding.aspx?SectionCode=CU001] ==See also== * [[Yash Raj Films]] ==Notes== {{Reflist}} {{Yash Raj Films}} [[Category:Film production companies of the United Kingdom]] [[Category:Yash Raj Films]]
